attributes.action: DAVID CAMERON TO STEP DOWN AS PRIME MINISTER. NOW
attributes.additional_details: DAVID CAMERON PRIME MINISTER MUST STAND DOWN/RESIGN. THE MAN IS MAKING THE NATION WORSE. LET'S CALL FOR AN IMMEDIATE RE - ELECTION AS THIS COALITION AIN,T WORKING. NOT WORKED FROM DAY ONE.  DAVID CAMERONS POLICES ARE FARCICAL THEY DO MORE FIGHTING WITH EACH OTHER IN THE HOUSE OF COMMANS.
